title: JSON schema for Visual Studio Live Share config files

excludeFiles.description: An array of globs which indicate the files that should be completely unavailable to guests when you share (e.g. secrets).

gitignore.description: Indicates how .gitignore files should be treated with respects to excluding/hiding files from guests.

hideFiles.description: An array of globs which indicate the files that should be hidden from guest's file trees, but still accessible (e.g. when following the host).
